name: Shake Shack Upper West Side
address: 366 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

reviews.text: Double charged me for the same order. Also had to wait 1 hour before they realize Â«Â my order is lost in the systemÂ Â». Although they confirmed multiple times that itâ€™s being processed. Lost 19$ :(
Burger wasnâ€™t up to usual shake shack standards. The malt shake was amazing
Lunch was absolutely amazing.  I love Shake Shacks Coffee Shake.  Delicious!!
Tasty
Great location for a Shake Shack - right across from AMNH!    Quick service, friendly staff and good burgers.
Delicious burger and very friendly staff ğŸ‘
Excelente servicio y comida
Lange Wartezeit

Best Burger ever! Man kann bequem am Computer bestellen und alles wird frisch zubereitet. Die burger waren perfekt gebraten, auch die Pommes waren knackig. Wir werden bestimmt wiederkommen. Absolute recommendation!
Papa (Papaye) is absolutely exceptional!! His service is simply extraordinary!
The service was wow Jamel is so cool and nice. Very kind !

They only take orders via touch pads, which takes more than double as long as if people would order directly on the cash register, I also had to wait quite a while for my order to be ready. Fast food? Not really

Better off going across the street for the pre fix at le pecora Bianca because the amount of money i paid for sloppy serving, cold nuggets and burger is not worth it, at all. Never again. Garbage food.

Il mio primo shake shack e devo dire molto sopra le mie aspettative, nulla di paragonabile ai fast food in italia. Ho preso un bacon cheeseburger doppio + patatine + milkshake e la loro birra signature. Il panino Ã¨ fatto bene, bun di qualitÃ  ben tostato, la carne Ã¨ ben speziata, bacon croccante e formaggio ben sciolto. Patatine molto buone, con una forma particolare che cattura benissimo sale e salse. Il milkshake alla fragola ottimo e la birra Ã¨ fatta da Brooklyn Brewery, una garanzia. In totale ho speso 37$, direi ok per i prezzi di NYC. Una cameriera Ã¨ venuta a fare 4 chiacchere e mi ha detto che gli imgredienti sono tutti freschi, e la catena ci conta per differenziarsi da gli altri fast food. Consigliatissimo dopo la visita al museo di storia naturale!
Shake burger and french onion soup burger are great!!!!

An affordable great burger!
Had a craving and came here would recommend for a bite(could upper small but it really filled me up), service can be a bit slow but it doesn't really matter
Beware of limited sitting
Siempre lleno pero siempre bien!

Super Burger. Aktuell fÃ¼r mich einer der Besten. Location war super.
é›è‚‰æ¼¢å ¡å£å‘³åé¹¹ï¼ŒåŸå‘³è–¯æ¢å¾ˆå¥½åƒï¼Œå¥¶æ˜”å°±æ˜¯ç”œå£

Was there on a semi-holiday (Yom Kippur) for lunch and it was very busy - lot of families with school-aged kids - so our order for 5 was ready in twice as much time as estimated (I ordered online). Almost didn't realize the online orders are not picked up from the front counter where dining-in order come out. But I talked to a staff member and they were helpful. Good service and hard-working attitude by staff team here. Seating is decent - two levels of seating. And didn't wait long to use bathroom. But it can be crowded!
Need better service and more seats

insanely crowded. staff training & management can be better; although large crowds and outdoor noise levels make it difficult to maintain a calm atmosphere. hygiene is not the best either & rather below average compared to other shake shack locations. however, food is still great and they do complete your order in a timely matter. would say that there was not a single staff member in sight at the register to accept cash.

Iâ€™d like to express my sincere thanks to Mamodou for the outstanding service at Shake Shack. He was extremely friendly, fast, and attentive, which really made our experience special. Thank you so much, Mamodou!
waited 2 hours for the food. asked for help over 5 times and nobody seemed to care. terrible, terrible service.
I ordered through door dash last night and the food was cold and disgusting. Poor packaging and who ever fixed the order didnâ€™t care . I would never order from here again.
Not clean tool forever many employees not doing amything.
It took 30min to get the order, way too long for "fast food".
Clean and efficient, but veggie burgers arenâ€™t good - no lettuce & tomato, very salty and drenched in orange goo (cheddar?)
Ottimi hamburger e patatine con buon rapporto qualitÃ /prezzo, sicuramente per l'alta qualitÃ  della carne di Angus
Nice location close to central park
Lanches divinos! Amei este lugar melhor hambÃºrguer de NY
Super fast, the food is amazing and all the staff is so sweet and attentive, it is no so expensive. Coming again

Two of your waiters Lerone & Jessica were amazing. We went down to the lower level & they cleaned our tables, refilled our drinks & were extremely professional. If every Shake Shack has service like this, I will always return. The place was clean and the food was excellent! Thank you Jessica & Lerone for making our experience a great one!!
Wir haben uns hier einen Shake geholt â€“ einfach mega lecker! absolut empfehlenswert.

Good spot for a quick bite. The burgers are tasty and consistent with other Shake Shack locations, and the shakes never disappoint. Service can be a bit slow during peak hours, and seating inside is limited. Staff are generally friendly, however when I asked for a drink without ice, the woman at the counter reacted rudely, which made the service feel less friendly.

I never received my food after placing my pick up online. I waited over 30 minutes and  my food wasnâ€™t made. No one was willing to help me or check on my order. I went and spoke to a customer service rep on the chat and they said they couldnâ€™t help and then proceeded to disconnect the chat. Worst experience ever. Waste of money and time.
Iâ€™ve been here multiple times and every time I interact with their greeter Sarah I canâ€™t help but smile! She has a very warm personality and is always so helpful!
Excelent

Cibo nella media, magari di buona qualitÃ  ma prezzi gonfiati e sicuramente sopravvalutato. Il servizio Ã¨ stato purtroppo molto lento, non ci ritornerei. Ci sono altri posti dove poter mangiare ottimi hamburger a nyc.
A faire absolument... les burgers, avec de la viande de bÅ“uf Angus sont tout simplement dÃ©licieux (en photo, la version avocado burger).
These people donâ€™t understand English at all.. they completely massed up my order
Classic burger and fries, fast service, and super friendly staff.

Itâ€™d been a while since Iâ€™d last had Shake Shack, but I had a craving and ordered a Shack Burger and Fries for pick-up.

With its proximity to the American Museum of Natural History and Central Park, this location can get quite busy, but I went for a very late lunch or very early dinner, so the lines werenâ€™t too long.

My pick-up experience was very positive, thanks to the friendly, helpful staff.
When I arrived, I couldnâ€™t locate the pick-up counter, so I asked one of the staff. They told me and very kindly guided me to where it was, at the back of the restaurant.
The staff with the pick-up orders was also very friendly.

Although it was a very short time, by the time I got home, the food wasnâ€™t hot. Iâ€™d arrived before my pick-up time, but my order was already there, so maybe itâ€™d been sitting there for a bit.
Both my Shack Burger and Fries were still good, though. Their burgers arenâ€™t as greasy as some other places and the fries are crinkle cut fries.

I love ketchup and realized after I got home that I shouldâ€™ve gotten extra, because I use it for both my burger and fries, and it only came with 2 packets. Note for next time.

It was a good experience overall, though. Great service really makes all the difference.
Burger and shakes were really good.. try their banana pudding
Short walk from the museum. Great food as expected. The only issue was the lack of seating.
Good
75 dollars Ã  3 mais que câ€™est bon ğŸ¤¤ğŸ¤¤ğŸ¤¤
